dcterms:creator: Hyun Oh Song
Yu Xiang
Stefanie Jegelka
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: Stanford Online Products (SOP) contains 120,053 online product images in 22,634 categories, with 2 to 10 images per category. The dataset is used for training and testing in image retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: Stanford Online Products (SOP)

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Shi Qiu
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: In-shop Clothes Retrieval (IN-SHOP) contains 72,712 clothing images across 7,986 classes, with a training set of 25,882 images and a test set partitioned into query and gallery sets.
dcterms:title: In-shop Clothes Retrieval (IN-SHOP)

dcterms:creator: Yuying Ge
Ruimao Zhang
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
Ping Luo
dcterms:description: Deep Fashion 2 (DEEPFASHION2) is a consumer to shop retrieval dataset containing 217,778 clothing bounding boxes with valid consumer to shop pairs, used for detection, pose estimation, segmentation, and re-identification.
dcterms:title: Deep Fashion 2 (DEEPFASHION2)
